casebody.data:
WYNN RESORTS LIMITED; John J. Hagenbuch; Ray R. Irani; Jay L. Johnson; Robert J. Miller; Patricia Mulroy; Clark T. Randt, Jr.; Alvin V. Shoemaker; J. Edward Virtue; D. Boone Wayson; and Matthew Maddox, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Linda Marie Bell, Chief District Judge, Respondents,
and
Bruce Bannister; Lana Talamas; Howard Meadows; Gerald Oonigian; Larry Clerks; Joe Tillotson; John Kalish; Florence Kalish; Marvin Myers; William Caproni; Rodney V. John; A. Larain John; Clifford Nazzaro; and Lawrence Weiner, Real Parties in Interest. John J. Hagenbuch; Ray R. Irani; Jay L. Johnson; Robert J. Miller; Patricia Mulroy; Clark T. Randt, Jr.; Alvin V. Shoemaker; J. Edward Virtue; D. Boone Wayson; and Matthew Maddox, Petitioners,
v.
The Eighth Judicial District Court of the State of Nevada, in and for the County of Clark; and the Honorable Linda Marie Bell, Respondents,
and
Thomas Dinapoli, Derivatively on Behalf of Wynn Resorts Limited, Real Party in Interest. No. 78381
No. 78394 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 26, 2019

DENIED.
